May 18, 1954
JCET MEMBERS
AMERICAN COUNCIL ON EDUCATION
David D. Henry. Chairman
ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION
BY RADIO-TELEVISION
Franklin Dunham
ASSOCIATION OF LAND-GRANT
COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES
James H. Denison
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF
EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
GRAYDON AUSMUS
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STATE
UNIVERSITIES
Albert N. Jorgensen
NATIONAL COUNCIL OF CHIEF
STATE SCHOOL OFFICERS
Edgar Fuller, Vice-Chairman
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
President, NAEB
Box 2002
University, Alabama
NATIONAL EDUCATION ASSOCIATION
OF THE UNITED STATES
Belmont Farley
Dear Graydon:
I agree with you that our meeting was an
excellent one. I hope that our plans to
schedule our meetings for the entire year
in advance will facilitate attendance.
It should also be possible for the
Committee to meet informally during the
NAEB October conference in New York. I
am sure that most of us will be there and
I like the idea of having meetings in
connection with other groups on the
informal "committee of the whole‚Äù side.
My best regards to your good family.
Sincerely,
P.S. I am also pleased to enclose check
covering your expenses for the May
14 meeting.
Enel Ck #5039
